page.title: 08Balmullo Gala Day
page.content: Mrs Scott, who stays in the village, remembered how much happiness was created by Gala Days in her village when she was a child, and so she decided to organise a similar event in Balmullo. Two years ago it was decided to amalgamate the Gala Day with Sports Day. Preparations take several months to ensure a full and smooth programme of events on the day. A Gala Queen, a Herald, two attendants and a Page Boy are elected by the primary school pupils. For several weeks before the Gala, these pupils attend rehearsals and have their costumes fitted. This day is also used as a fund-raising occasion for the various societies in the village. People can buy plants, toys and snacks for example and try competitions.
